org.sdnplatform.sync

Interface IStoreListener<K>

  • Type Parameters:
    K - the key type for the store
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    OFSwitchManager, SyncManagerTest.TestListener, SyncStoreCCProvider.ShortListener, SyncStoreCCProvider.StringListener

    public interface IStoreListener<K>
    A listener interface that will receive updates on a particular store
